title: Bloglist call
author: VD
content_html: I completely forgot to do it last time, but this time I will be sure to actually get everyone’s blogs onto the blogroll. I’ve had a few requests lately, so if you’d like to have your blog added to the Voxologisti, please let me know in the comments to this post. The only requirement is to put VP in your blogroll and to give me both your blogname as well as the blog URL.
